name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"d1f7d22f-86cf-414d-9c56-a6babcd81c68","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: assign","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b7eb5a0d-7609-4882-92dc-556327107191","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is an internal helper dedicated to handling the most common type of assignment: setting a simple variable name (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x = 10","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"name = "Alice"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). Nested within ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_visit_assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it focuses on linking a specific target variable (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") to a source value (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"y","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") within the constraints of the current scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4698f960-4695-4e5e-a3b9-d7080a8c3aba","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Not all assignments are created equal. Assigning a variable at the top level of a function is a permanent definition. Assigning a variable inside an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block is a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"potential","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" change that depends on runtime conditions. This function distinguishes between these two states to prevent "polluting" the global analysis with temporary or conditional values.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"28939cf8-1140-4417-8f1c-c1ee2dadce90","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"07af575d-144b-4f1c-87d6-d5174dd06ba9","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Target Resolution:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It iterates through the list of targets (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"xList","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). It ensures a Definition object exists for the variable. If not, it creates a new ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NAME_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"020a4af8-43e9-4e0a-b7c8-135e064f22f0","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Check:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It checks what kind of block we are currently analyzing (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"curNsDefi","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"4e24e952-ab94-470b-b6ad-016da6f7c803","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Normal Block (Function/Class/Module):","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If we are in standard code, it calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add_value_point","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This permanently records that "Variable X points to Value Y at line Z."","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4b6db43e-fc9d-48aa-a075-d00d19cd6a7e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Conditional Block (If/While/Else):","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If we are inside a control flow block, it checks if the variable was defined ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"inside","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" this block or outside it.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"f2d4df78-eb1e-4fa3-b7de-b1a5ee216047","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If defined locally (inside the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it updates it normally.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0be85ab9-3df1-4970-9c4c-243aef482b23","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If defined outside (e.g., modifying a global variable inside an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"change_manager.addChange","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This registers a temporary modification that will later be merged, rather than overwriting the original variable immediately.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]}]},{"id":"6ef6d80d-2dbd-40c3-8e6f-7f41ac178b80","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Code:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cfa28b63-b009-46d1-8748-baf47809414a","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"x = 0
if condition:
    x = 1  # <--- Analysis here","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"71111721-bb5a-4032-91f4-3a62a41b768f","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The analyzer is inside the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ed684b3b-a2d1-4df5-a82f-fe3aea3fa768","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" sees ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x = 1","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e849d943-f263-40e1-8dd3-11c601ce5a6e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It checks ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" was defined in the outer scope, not the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9d2e628d-7a16-4b37-a493-196404dbb304","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It tells ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"change_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": "Record that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" changes to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"1","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" inside this specific block."","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"96317932-98a9-443e-80c7-64faa60d1449","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It does ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"not","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" touch the original ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x=0","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" definition yet. That happens later during the merge phase.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5a078b9d-9e3e-41b3-8a3c-7616bd7f2063","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
